measured_by: Frequency estimation task for Linda and James scenarios (1–100 scale)
justification: “Participants read the scenario and estimated how many of a 100 people like Linda fit a particular target description… The dependent variable was the estimated frequency of the described personality in the scenario measured on a scale from 1 to 100.”

measured_by: Percentage estimation questions about people, females, and males matching target categories
justification: In the extension, “participants were asked to estimate the percentage of people, females, and males in the United States that match the target item (likely, unlikely, "and", "and are"), and they did so for both profiles.”
